info.name: Minimalist Pandora
info.description:
A Pandora theme based off of kodayoda713's original theme which can be found here:
http://userstyles.org/styles/57845/pandora-full-length-full-height-no-ads

It's been tested with a 1440x900 display, so there might be errors with larger and smaller resolutions.
info.additionalInfo: If you guys are feeling generous I'd really appreciate it if you donated to my Pledgie campaign! It doesn't have to be much... Just a dollar or two. Everything helps!
